Love it so far. Very clean UI. Useful settings like autostart on app launch. Ability to show/hide functions. Using Nova gesture and light starts instantly. Strobe is an added bonus, good for signalling and self defense. And app remembers strobe setting when relaunching app. No ads but I'll gladly toss some money to the devs if I don't have any issues. This is the way app development should be done.

google_play_reviews.replyContent: Hey, that is the stroboscope, try changing its frequency to see it work better.

google_play_reviews.content: Most simple flashlight app you'll find. Downloaded for the fact it has 0 ads. It's functional; I'd know as I had it active on my cellphone for nearly a week on an absolete S4 as an experiment to see how long it could illuminate a section of my room. It eventually quit working after several days of having it on. I'm not sure whether the app crashed or if it the flashlight just ran out of juice. Drawback of having a simple app is that it doesn't have too many features to customize said function.
Got what I expected. Perfect for my need, no unwanted distractions.
perfect!
